DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled, parallel group study of a seven-week ascending dose period of SLV308 adjunctive to L-dopa treatment in patients with advanced stage Parkinson's disease (PD) and dose-dependent motor fluctuations. Patients (outpatients) will be randomized to one of three different treatment arms.
DOC.brief_title: Ascending Dose Tolerability/Safety of SLV308 for the Treatment of Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients who have signed an informed consent; diagnosis of idiopathic PD. Presence of recognizable "on" and "off" stages Minimum hours of "off" time per day of 2.5 hours Able to keep diaries. Unclear diagnosis or a suspicion of other parkinsonian syndromes Have undergone surgical treatment for PD History of nonresponse to Ldopa.
